text: jab allaah ne kahaah he eesa! main tujhe poornatah lene vaala tatha apanee or uthaane vaala hoon tatha tujhe kaafiron se pavitr (mukt) karane vaala hoon tatha tere anuyaayiyon ko pralay ke din tak kaafiron ke oopar[1] karane vaala hoon. phir tumhaara lautana meree hee or hai. to main tumhaare beech us vishay mein nirnay kar doonga, jisamen tum vibhed kar rahe ho
